entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
